name: studio craft retreat - dotty giraffe
description:
Secure your place at the retreat!

Kristen Doran invites you to join her for an exciting morning of sewing and general crafty fun at her new studio in the Sutherland Shire, NSW. 

With only space for 6 people, this will be a fun session to learn how to sew and create your very own dotty giraffe (see here: http://kristendorandesign.blogspot.com.au/p/sew.html).

This class is aimed at adult beginner/intermediate/advanced sewers only. Please contact me if you are interested in kids sewing classes and I can point you in the right direction (there are a few in the Shire).

It will be a lovely class with all materials and instructions included in the cost - just come along,  learn some new skills and meet some new friends in a relaxing, picturesque environment.

Limited to 6 people. If this class is full and payment has been received, you will go on the waiting list for the next class or receive a refund.

Friday
15 November 2013
Address provided on receipt of payment.
11am - 1pm
cost: $40 includes fabric and instructions

*please note you need to bring your own sewing machine on the day.
Payment is transferable if you are unable to attend due to illness.

The not so fine print:

Studio address will be provided after payment is received.
By accepting a place at the studio craft retreat you agree that we are not responsible for any theft or injury that may occur at our premises or in our classes.

There are a number of stairs (27) to get to the studio. If you are not comfortable going down stairs please do no book into this class. I will be running classes at another venue with easier access later in the year.

Please email us at design@kristendoran.com if you have any questions.

name: winter nest cushion cover
description:
hand printed cushion cover with envelope back.
Charcoal cotton/hemp printed with black winter nest.
45cm x 45cm.

name: Kokeshi Doll
description:
NEW! Purchase this soft fabric Kokeshi doll to cuddle or just add that cute factor to a little girl's room.
Approx 24cm tall and handprinted in Australia on organic cotton/hemp fabric.
Choose from 1 of 3 dolls.
From left to right please say hello to: 
Yuki, Momo and Izumi

Printed and Made in Australia.
